ThingDef.Name: WeatheredBasalt
ThingDef.label: Weathered Basalt
ThingDef.description: A wall of weathered basalt, the most common igneous rock.

ThingDef.Name: SolidBasalt
ThingDef.label: Solid Basalt
ThingDef.description: A solid wall of basalt, composed of deep layers of ancient lava flows.

ThingDef.Name: PassableBasalt
ThingDef.label: Ancient lava flow
ThingDef.description: A weathered lava flow. This was once a river of molted rock, but has since cooled and shattered.

ThingDef.Name: WeatheredGranite
ThingDef.label: Weathered Granite
ThingDef.description: Large masses of eroded granite. Granite is an igenous rock which cooled slowly deep underground, allowing for large crystals to form. Is hardness and consistency make it a great building material, but it is hard to mine.

ThingDef.Name: SolidGranite
ThingDef.label: Solid Granite
ThingDef.description: Large masses of solid granite. Granite is an igenous rock which cooled slowly deep underground, allowing for large crystals to form. Is hardness and consistency make it a great building material, but it is hard to mine.

ThingDef.Name: PassableGranite
ThingDef.label: Granite Bolders
ThingDef.description: Granite Bolders. These are small enough to climb over and make great cover in a gunfight.

ThingDef.Name: WeatheredMarble
ThingDef.label: Weathered Marble
ThingDef.description: Eroded Marble, a metamorphic rock of metled and recrystallized limestone. Its consistency and softness make it a popular building material.

ThingDef.Name: SolidMarble
ThingDef.label: Solid Marble
ThingDef.description: Solid Marble, a metamorphic rock of metled and recrystallized limestone. Its consistency and softness make it a popular building material.

ThingDef.Name: PassableMarble
ThingDef.label: Marble Boulders
ThingDef.description: Large boulders of marble. Good for building material and cover in one of gunfights that occur so frequently on this rimworld.

ThingDef.Name: WeatheredLimestone
ThingDef.label: Weathered Limestone
ThingDef.description: Impassable masses of eroded limestone, a sedimentary rock composed of the shells of long-dead sealife. It makes a good building material.

ThingDef.Name: SolidLimestone
ThingDef.label: Solid Limestone
ThingDef.description: A wall of solid limestone, a sedimentary rock composed of the shells of long-dead sealife. It makes a good building material.

ThingDef.Name: PassableLimestone
ThingDef.label: Eroded limestone
ThingDef.description: A shelf of eroded limestone. Large cracks worn by centuries of rain make traveling over this terrain difficult.

ThingDef.Name: PassableSlate
ThingDef.label: Slate rubble pile
ThingDef.description: A pile or large slate rocks. Some of these naturally rectangular stones can be used for building without stonecutting.
